\\n

Definitions:

\\n
    \\n
  • \\\"Lender\\\" includes the Lender's agents, service providers, and any of their succesors and assigns.
    • \\n
  • \\\"Other Loan Participants! incudes (i) any actual or potencial owners of a loan resulting from this application (the \\\"Loan\\\"), (ii) acquires of any beneficial or other interes in the Loan, (iii) any mortage insyrer, (iv) any guatantor, (v) any service of the Loan, and (vi) any of these parties' service providers, succesor or assigns.
    • \\n
\\n

I agree to, acknowledge, and represent the following:

\\n

(1) The Complete Information for this Application

\\n
    \\n
  • The information I have provided in this application is true, accurate, and complete as of the date I signed this application.
    • \\n
  • If the information I submitted change and supplement this application, including providing any update/supplemented real estate sales contract.
    • \\n
  • For purchase trnsactions: The terms and conditions of any real estate sales contract signed by me in connection with this application are true, accuratem and complete to the best of my knowledge and belief. I have not entered into any other agreement, writeen or oral, in coneection with this real estate transaction.
    • \\n
  • The Lender and Other Loan Participants may rely on the information contained in the application before and after closing of the Loan.
    • \\n
  • Any intentional or negligent mirepresentation of information may reult in the imposition of:
    • \\n
\\n

(a) civil liability on me, including monetary damages, if a preson sufferes any loss beacause the person relied on any misrepresentation that I have made on this application, and/or

\\n

(b) criminal penalties on me including, but no limited to, fine or imprisonment or both under the provisions of Federal lay ( 18 U.S.C §§ 1001 et seq.).

\\n

(2) The Property's Security

\\n

The Loan I have applied for in this appliction will be secured by a mortage or deed of trust which provides the Lender a security interest in the property described in this application.

\\n

(3) The Property's Appraisal, Value, and Condition

\\n
    \\n
  • Any appraisal or value of the property obtained by the Lender is for use by the Lender and Other Loan Participants-
    • \\n
  • The Lender and Other Loan Participants have not made any representation or warranty, express or implied, to me about the property, its condition, or its value.
    • \\n
\\n

(4) Electronic Records and Signatures

\\n
    \\n
  • The Lender and Other Loan Participants may keep any paper record and/or electronic record of this application, wheter or not the Loan is appoved.
    • \\n
\\n
    \\n
  • If this application is created as (or converted into) an \\\"electronic application\\\", I consent to the use of \\\"electromic records\\\" and \\\"electronic signatures\\\" as the terms are defined in and governed by applicable Federal and/or stat electronic transactions laws. 
    • \\n
  • I intend to sign and have signed this application either using my:
    • \\n
\\n

(a) electronic signature; or

\\n

(b) a written signature and agree that if a papaer version of this application is converted into an electronic application, the application wil be my binding electronic signature.

\\n
    \\n
  • I agree that the application, if delivered or transmitted ti the Lender or Other Loan Participants as an electronic record with my electronic signature, will be as effective and enforceable as a paper application signed by me in writting.
    • \\n
\\n

(5) Delinquiency

\\n
    \\n
  • The Lender and Other Loan Participants may report information about account to credit bureaus. Late payments, missed paymentes,or other defaults on my account may be reflected in my credit report and will likely affect my credit score.
    • \\n
  • If I have trouble making my payments I undestand that I may contac a HUD-approved housing counseling organization for advice about actions I can take to meet my mortage obligations.
    • \\n
\\n

(6) Authorization for Use and Sharing of Information

\\n

By signing below, in addition to the representations and agreements made above, I expressly authorize the Lender and Other Loan participants to obtain, use, and share with eash other (i) the loan application and related loan information and documentation, (ii) a consumer credit report on me, and (iii) my task return infotmation, as necessary to perform the actions listed below, for so long as they have an interest in my loan or its servicing:

\\n

(a) process and underwrite my loan;

\\n

(b) verify any data contained in my consumer credit report, my loan application and other information supporting my loan application;

\\n

(c) inform credit and investment decisions by the Lender and Other Loan Participants;

\\n

(d) perform audit, quality control, and legal compliance analysis and reviews;

\\n

(e) perform analysis and modeling for risk assessments;

\\n

(f) monitor the account for this lian for potencial deliquencies and determine any assitance that  may be availabe to me; and

\\n

(g) other actions permissible under applicable law.

\\n
